autoAppliedRules.name: User AI Instruction
autoAppliedRules.content:
‚Ä¢	Always provide original, creative website ideas with suggestions for distinguishing features, design concepts, and user experience improvements.
	‚Ä¢	When asked for website code, give fully functional, modular, and well-commented code examples. Include suggestions for structuring files, libraries/frameworks to use, and explain why.
	‚Ä¢	For machine learning questions, summarize the key concepts, explain the logic/intuition behind algorithms, and when relevant, show well-documented code (preferably in Python, using popular frameworks like scikit-learn, TensorFlow, or PyTorch).
	‚Ä¢	When requested, create small, complete project blueprints‚Äîdetailing features, architectures, and step-by-step development plans.
	‚Ä¢	Offer best practices, optimization tips, pros and cons, and potential pitfalls for any code or approach. Cite up-to-date resources when possible.
	‚Ä¢	When asked about algorithms, clearly explain their time and space complexity, use cases, and potential improvements. Support explanations with pseudocode and real code.
	‚Ä¢	Never generate generic or repetitive ideas; always provide at least one unique angle, novel feature, or application.
	‚Ä¢	Before giving any solution, clarify assumptions and suggest ideas for possible extensions or creative improvements.
	‚Ä¢	Gently point out edge cases and encourage testing and validation.
	‚Ä¢	Where helpful, summarize with bullet points or tables for clarity.

 Be innovative and think outside the box.

autoAppliedRules.name: Repository Information Overview
autoAppliedRules.content:
# Defense Solutions Web Application Information

## Summary
A modern web application for defense solutions built with React, Express, and TypeScript. The application features a client-side React frontend and a server-side Express backend, with Supabase integration for database operations.

## Structure
- `/client` - React frontend application with components, pages, and assets
- `/server` - Express backend server with API routes and database integration
- `/shared` - Shared types and database schemas using Drizzle ORM
- `/api` - API route handlers for serverless deployment

## Language & Runtime
**Language**: TypeScript/JavaScript
**Version**: TypeScript 5.6.3
**Build System**: Vite 5.4.19
**Package Manager**: pnpm (inferred from build commands)

## Dependencies
**Main Dependencies**:
- React 18.3.1 - Frontend UI library
- Express 4.21.2 - Backend server framework
- Supabase - Backend as a service for database operations
- Drizzle ORM - Database ORM with PostgreSQL support
- TailwindCSS - Utility-first CSS framework
- Wouter - Routing library for React
- Tanstack Query - Data fetching library
- Zod - Schema validation library

**Development Dependencies**:
- Vite - Build tool and development server
- TypeScript - Static type checking
- ESBuild - JavaScript bundler
- Drizzle Kit - Database migration tools

## Build & Installation
```bash
# Install dependencies
pnpm install

# Development mode
pnpm dev

# Production build
pnpm build

# Start production server
pnpm start

# Database schema push
pnpm db:push
```

## Database
**Type**: PostgreSQL (via Supabase)
**ORM**: Drizzle ORM
**Schema**: Defined in `shared/schema.ts`
**Tables**:
- users - User authentication
- contact_submissions - Contact form submissions

## Deployment
**Platform**: Vercel (configured via vercel.json)
**Build Command**: `pnpm build`
**Output Directory**: `dist/public`
**Environment Variables**:
- PORT - Server port (default: 3000)
- DATABASE_URL - PostgreSQL connection string
- SUPABASE_URL - Supabase project URL
- SUPABASE_ANON_KEY - Supabase anonymous key

## Client Application
**Framework**: React with TypeScript
**Routing**: Wouter
**State Management**: React Query
**UI Components**: Custom components with Radix UI primitives
**Styling**: TailwindCSS with SCSS
**Entry Point**: `client/src/main.tsx`

## Server Application
**Framework**: Express
**API Routes**: RESTful endpoints in `/api` directory
**Database Access**: Supabase client
**Entry Point**: `server/index.ts`
**Static Serving**: Production build serves static files from `dist/public`

## Testing
**Target Framework**: Playwright

content.text:
The user wants me to completely redesign the Certifications page. They want:
1. A complete redesign including all components
2. Keep the same colors (teal #21808d, navy #134252, cream #fcfcf9, white #ffffff, charcoal, gold #FFD700)
3. Proper flow
4. Professional and dynamic
5. Better visual hierarchy

This is a complex task that requires understanding the current design and creating something that:
- Has better flow and organization
- Feels more professional and modern
- Has dynamic interactions
- Maintains the color scheme
- Uses proper visual hierarchy

Let me start by understanding what needs to be redesigned and then create a plan.

I should create a todo list for this complex task, then start working on it.
I'll completely redesign the Certifications page with a professional, dynamic flow while maintaining your color scheme. Let me create a todo list to track this work.

todos.content: Redesign Certifications page with improved layout and flow
Run lint and typecheck to ensure code quality

content.output: [{"id":"1","content":"Redesign Certifications page with improved layout and flow","status":"in_progress"},{"id":"2","content":"Run lint and typecheck to ensure code quality","status":"pending"}]

content.text:
Now let me redesign the Certifications page. I want to create a modern, professional layout with:

1. Better visual hierarchy
2. Improved flow - from hero to featured certs to industry certs
3. More dynamic interactions
4. Professional animations
5. Keep the teal, navy, cream, white, charcoal, and gold colors
6. Better typography hierarchy
7. More engaging card designs
8. Smoother transitions
9. Better use of whitespace

Key improvements:
- Modern hero section with better typography
- Three featured certs in a more sophisticated layout
- Industry certs in a gallery/showcase format
- Better visual separation between sections
- More refined animations
- Better responsive design
- More professional styling
- Better use of accent colors

Let me write the redesigned component.

1‚Üíimport React from "react";
     2‚Üíimport { Layout } from "@/components/Layout";
     3‚Üíimport { motion, useReducedMotion } from "framer-motion";
     4‚Üíimport { Card } from "@/components/ui/card";
     5‚Üíimport { FaBrain, FaNetworkWired, FaCodeBranch, FaShieldAlt, FaMedal, FaCheck } from "react-icons/fa";
     6‚Üí
     7‚Üíexport default function Certifications() {
     8‚Üí    const prefersReduced = useReducedMotion();
     9‚Üí
    10‚Üí    const containerVariants = {
    11‚Üí        hidden: { opacity: 0 },
    12‚Üí        visible: {
    13‚Üí            opacity: 1,
    14‚Üí            transition: { staggerChildren: prefersReduced ? 0 : 0.15, delayChildren: 0.2 },
    15‚Üí        },
    16‚Üí    };
    17‚Üí
    18‚Üí    const itemVariants = {
    19‚Üí        hidden: { opacity: 0, y: prefersReduced ? 0 : 20 },
    20‚Üí        visible: {
    21‚Üí            opacity: 1,
    22‚Üí            y: 0,
    23‚Üí            transition: { duration: 0.6, ease: [0.22, 1, 0.36, 1] },
    24‚Üí        },
    25‚Üí    };
    26‚Üí
    27‚Üí    const featuredCerts = [
    28‚Üí        {
    29‚Üí            icon: <FaBrain className="w-full h-full" />,
    30‚Üí            title: "AI Research Excellence",
    31‚Üí            organization: "OpenAI Foundation",
    32‚Üí            date: "March 2024",
    33‚Üí            description: "Advanced certification in tactical artificial intelligence applications for defense systems.",
    34‚Üí            level: "IV",
    35‚Üí            code: "AI-SEC-024",
    36‚Üí            highlight: true,
    37‚Üí        },
    38‚Üí        {
    39‚Üí            icon: <FaNetworkWired className="w-full h-full" />,
    40‚Üí            title: "Neural Network Architecture",
    41‚Üí            organization: "Deep Learning Institute",
    42‚Üí            date: "January 2024",
    43‚Üí            description: "Specialized accreditation in developing hardened neural networks for mission-critical applications.",
    44‚Üí            level: "V",
    45‚Üí            code: "NN-DEF-124",
    46‚Üí            highlight: true,
    47‚Üí        },
    48‚Üí        {
    49‚Üí            icon: <FaCodeBranch className="w-full h-full" />,
    50‚Üí            title: "Open Source Contribution",
    51‚Üí            organization: "Global OSS Alliance",
    52‚Üí            date: "Ongoing",
    53‚Üí            description: "Recognition for contributions to secure, hardened open-source frameworks for defense applications.",
    54‚Üí            level: "ACTIVE",
    55‚Üí            code: "OSS-CTB-089",
    56‚Üí            highlight: true,
    57‚Üí        },
    58‚Üí    ];
    59‚Üí
    60‚Üí    const industryCerts = [
    61‚Üí        { title: "ISO 9001:2015", description: "Quality Management System", code: "QMS-001" },
    62‚Üí        { title: "AS9100D", description: "Aerospace Quality Standard", code: "AQS-100" },
    63‚Üí        { title: "ISO/IEC 27001", description: "Information Security Management", code: "ISM-270" },
    64‚Üí        { title: "CMMC Level 5", description: "Cybersecurity Maturity Model", code: "CMM-005" },

-
 export default function Certifications() {
     const prefersReduced = useReducedMotion();
 
-    const fadeInUp = {
-        hidden: { opacity: 0, y: prefersReduced ? 0 : 30 },
-        visible: { opacity: 1, y: 0, transition: { duration: 0.6, ease: [0.22, 1, 0.36, 1] } },

-
-    const fadeInScale = {
-        hidden: { opacity: 0, scale: prefersReduced ? 1 : 0.95 },
-        visible: { opacity: 1, scale: 1, transition: { duration: 0.5, ease: "easeOut" } },
-    } as const;
-
-    const staggerContainer = {
+    const containerVariants = {
         hidden: { opacity: 0 },
         visible: {
             opacity: 1,
-            transition: { staggerChildren: prefersReduced ? 0 : 0.12 },

         },
-    } as const;
+    };
 
-    const certifications = [

+            opacity: 1,
+            y: 0,
+            transition: { duration: 0.6, ease: [0.22, 1, 0.36, 1] },
+        },
+    };
+
+    const featuredCerts = [
         {
-            icon: <FaBrain className="w-7 h-7" />,
+            icon: <FaBrain className="w-full h-full" />,
             title: "AI Research Excellence",
             organization: "OpenAI Foundation",
             date: "March 2024",
-            description:
-                "Advanced certification in tactical artificial intelligence applications for defense systems.",
-            level: "LEVEL IV",
+            description: "Advanced certification in tactical artificial intelligence applications for defense systems.",
+            level: "IV",
             code: "AI-SEC-024",
+            highlight: true,
         },
         {
-            icon: <FaNetworkWired className="w-7 h-7" />,
+            icon: <FaNetworkWired className="w-full h-full" />,
             title: "Neural Network Architecture",
             organization: "Deep Learning Institute",
             date: "January 2024",
-            description:
-                "Specialized accreditation in developing hardened neural networks for mission-critical applications.",
-            level: "LEVEL V",
+            description: "Specialized accreditation in developing hardened neural networks for mission-critical applications.",
+            level: "V",
             code: "NN-DEF-124",
+            highlight: true,
         },
         {
-            icon: <FaCodeBranch className="w-7 h-7" />,
+            icon: <FaCodeBranch className="w-full h-full" />,
             title: "Open Source Contribution",
             organization: "Global OSS Alliance",
             date: "Ongoing",
-            description:
-                "Recognition for contributions to secure, hardened open-source frameworks for defense applications.",
+            description: "Recognition for contributions to secure, hardened open-source frameworks for defense applications.",
             level: "ACTIVE",
             code: "OSS-CTB-089",
+            highlight: true,
         },
     ];
 
-    const industryCertifications = [
+    const industryCerts = [
         { title: "ISO 9001:2015", description: "Quality Management System", code: "QMS-001" },
         { title: "AS9100D", description: "Aerospace Quality Standard", code: "AQS-100" },
         { title: "ISO/IEC 27001", description: "Information Security Management", code: "ISM-270" },

content.title: You‚Äôve hit your plan usage limits
